content.en: Tourism algorithms: Researchers are exploring how algorithms can be used to analyze and understand various aspects of tourism. They are investigating the application of association rules technique, data mining technology, big data platforms, and artificial intelligence to analyze tourist behavior, optimize tourism information systems, and upgrade ski resorts, among other things. These algorithms are being used to capture changes and trends in outbound tourism, analyze the impact of tourism development on the environment, and improve the construction quality of tourism management projects.
content.da: Turismealgoritmer: Forskere undersøger, hvordan algoritmer kan bruges til at analysere og forstå forskellige aspekter af turisme. De undersøger anvendelsen af association rules-teknikken, datamining-teknologi, big data-platforme og kunstig intelligens til at analysere turistadfærd, optimere turismeinformationssystemer og opgradere skisportssteder, blandt andet. Disse algoritmer bruges til at fange ændringer og tendenser inden for udgående turisme, analysere turismeudviklingens indvirkning på miljøet og forbedre konstruktionskvaliteten af turismestyringsprojekter.
